Package repository

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository
repository.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Repository
Repository class for managing personnel data, including Doctors, Patients, Pharmacists, and Admins. This class provides functionality for loading and saving personnel data to and from CSV files, as well as clearing and managing personnel records in memory.

    • loadFromCSV

      public boolean loadFromCSV()
      Loads all personnel records from their respective CSV files and sets the repository as loaded.
      Specified by:
      loadFromCSV in class Repository
      Returns:
      true if all records are successfully loaded; false otherwise

      Saves a specified personnel map to a CSV file.

      T - a type parameter extending User
      Parameters:

    • loadPersonnelFromCSV

      private static <T extends User> void loadPersonnelFromCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,T> personnelMap, Class<T> type)
      Loads personnel records from a CSV file into the specified personnel map.
      Type Parameters:
      T - a type parameter extending User
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the CSV file to load from
      personnelMap - the map to store the loaded personnel records
      type - the class type of personnel to load (e.g., Doctor, Patient)

    • csvToPersonnel

      private static <T extends User> T csvToPersonnel(String csv, Class<T> type)
      Converts a CSV line to a personnel object of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - a type parameter extending User
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string representing the personnel
      type - the class type of personnel to create (e.g., Doctor, Patient)
      Returns:
      a personnel object of the specified type, or null if parsing fails

    • setRepoLoaded

      public static void setRepoLoaded(Boolean isRepoLoaded)
      Sets the repository load status.
      Parameters:
      isRepoLoaded - true to set the repository as loaded, false otherwise
